title: How to Plan, Deliver and Assess a Learning Program
headline: Master effective strategies for delivering lessons, classroom management and assessment in this free online course.
description: The classroom has students from varied backgrounds, talents and personalities, so the teacher should devise strategies for positive learning outcomes. This course will introduce you to modern teaching techniques to fulfil student requirements and classroom management for a good learning environment. Learn everything from developing deeper learning and critical thinking skills to monitoring learning progress and providing constructive feedback.
courseDescription:
Have you ever created a learning program? This training course aims to give you the knowledge and the skills to develop course materials, organise classrooms and manage students' behaviour. We layout techniques for developing transferable skills and lesson delivery methods to create engaging classes, impart skills and adjust behaviours. We will look at the use of ICT in education, emerging technologies and the concept of collaborative learning. Explore giving effective feedback, assessment principles and critical reflection as a crucial part of the learning process.

We then explain how to communicate effectively with parents to foster positive relationships and meaningful dialogue. We establish the process of documenting student progress and achievement, moderation process including providing methods for monitoring learning progress. We compare the traditional and alternative approaches to assessment. Did you know that feedback improves learning outcomes? We teach you how to provide constructive feedback on student work and compare the features and advantages of oral and written feedback.

We discuss strategies to support learning, such as the physical and emotional learning environment. Do you want to be that teacher who your students remember when they are adults? The course will help you prepare for lesson delivery and equip you with the skills and knowledge to create a better learning experience with inclusive and collaborative learning for student success. This course is suitable for those pursuing a career in the teaching profession to improve their performance. Why wait? Start today!
